Generation I.Red: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
Generation I.Yellow: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
Generation I.Stadium: Its soft and supple skin allows it to expand like a balloon. If it gets angry, it inhales and inflates itself steadily.

Generation II.Gold: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won't want to be separated.
Generation II.Silver: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a Body Slam .
Generation II.Crystal: The rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can't stop touching it.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won't want to be separated. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a Body Slam . (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Wigglytuff has large, saucerlike eyes. The surfaces of its eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this Pok é mon 's eyes, it is quickly washed away.
Generation III.Sapphire: Wigglytuff 's body is very flexible. By inhaling deeply, this Pok é mon can inflate itself seemingly without end. Once inflated, Wigglytuff bounces along lightly like a balloon.
Generation III.Emerald: Its fur is the ultimate in luxuriousness. Sleeping alongside a Wigglytuff is simply divine. Its body expands seemingly without end when it inhales.
Generation III.FireRed: Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur conveys an image of luxury.
Generation III.LeafGreen: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

Generation VII.Sun: It sheds its fine fur when the seasons change. The fur is gathered and spun into a luxurious yarn.
Generation VII.Moon: As it inhales, it expands...and expands...and expands. Wigglytuff compete to see which one can inflate itself the most.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Thanks to its bouncy body and fine fur, this Pokémon is sought after. Holding one in your arms while you sleep feels great.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: When it gets angry, it inhales with all its might, and its body gradually inflates. Sometimes they can grow 20 times larger!
Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: Its body is very elastic. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Its body is very elastic. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.

Generation VIII.Sword: The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.
Generation VIII.Shield: It's proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture that's perfectly heavenly.
